text: Joseph D. Morelle ( ; born April 29, 1957) is an American politician. He has been the U.S. representative for New York's 25th congressional district since 2018. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the New York State Assembly. He was elected to the United States House of Representatives for New York's 25th congressional district in November 2018 following the death of longtime Representative Louise Slaughter. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Morelle official U.S. House website *Campaign website * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:People from Utica, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Joseph Morelle
